title: S13 Ep12: Sadistic Spirits & Lost Legends
itunes:title: Sadistic Spirits & Lost Legends
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS enters the realm of Sadistic Spirits & Lost Legends with Bud Steed.

The rugged and lonely Ozark Mountains of Missouri and Arkansas hold many secrets; cursed ground, haunted locations with lost spirits, buried treasures and lost mines are just a few of them. From stacks of Spanish silver and gold bars, to lost silver mines, to hidden outlaw loot, the tales of buried & lost riches, sadistic spirits, wandering ghosts are abundant in the folklore of the Ozarks and the South.

Get his books here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Visit his site here:
https://budsteed.com/
